Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器当前处于离线状态。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;目前只能抵达飞船下方的星球。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are currently offline.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Currently only the planet below is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器已上线。
> FTL引擎已上线。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;可以抵达整个宇宙。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> FTL drive is online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;The entire universe is accessible.

Texts.Chs:
> 飞船推进器已上线。
> FTL引擎已上线。
> 飞船传送系统正常运作。
> ^green;可以抵达这个恒星系中的所有星球。
Texts.Eng:
> Ship thrusters are online.
> Ship teleportation system functioning correctly.
> ^green;Planets within this star system are accessible.

Texts.Chs: 目前没有任何可行的任务坐标。
目前没有不活跃的船员。如果活跃船员的数量超过你可以容纳的船员数量，活跃船员就会变成不活跃的船员。
Texts.Eng: There are currently no inactive crew members. Crew members become inactive if the the amount of active crew exceeds the amount of crew you can hold.

Texts.Chs:
你是这艘飞船唯一的在籍船员。
招募额外的船员可有助于提高运作效率。
Texts.Eng:
You are the only registered crew member of this ship.
Recruiting additional crew members may allow for increased operational efficiency.
